Experience

Senior full-stack Developer - Mer GmbH

Mar 2023 - Jan 2025 | German & English | Remote work - Tech: TS | React | Vite | Docker | Azure

My daily work involved managing (from development to deployment) the frontend of two complex dashboards. Both applications focussed on electric vehicle charging infrastructure. In one of the projects I was part of a team of eight developers, while in the second one, I was the only frontend developer.

Senior full-stack Developer - Jomigo GmbH

Nov 2022 - Jan 2023 | English | Remote work - Tech: TS | React | NextJs | NodeJs | MySql

As the first engineer to join the company, I started the codebase and the organizational management for developing a CRM dashboard. The MVP version of the app was finished. The company had financial issues and the project was stopped.

Full-stack Developer - Traffective GmbH

Nov 2020 - Oct 2022 | German | Remote work - Tech: Python | Databricks | AWS | TS | NodeJs | Selenium | MongoDB | MySql

I built an automated daily reporting system using Pyspark and Databricks, which saved sixteen hours of work weekly from other colleagues. Additionally, I implemented the first services written in Typescript and improved general code quality of projects.

Software Developer - Sport1 GmbH

June 2018 - Oct 2020 | German | In-office work - Tech: TS | React Native | NodeJs | Express | MySql

Wrote typescript daily. Large use of ReactJS (also NextJS, GatsbyJS, React Native) together with different tools as Typescript, Jest, and Styled System.
